Package com.perforce.p4java.option.client

Class Summary
AddFilesOptions IClient addFiles method Options definitions.
CopyFilesOptions Options class for the IClient copyFiles method.
DeleteFilesOptions Options-based method options for IClient deleteFiles method(s).
EditFilesOptions Options subclass for use with IClient editFiles method(s).
GetDiffFilesOptions Options subclass for the IClient.getDiffFiles method.
IntegrateFilesOptions Options for the IClient.integrateFiles method.
LabelSyncOptions Label sync options subclass for use with IClient.labelSync.
LockFilesOptions Options subclass for IClient.lockFiles.
MergeFilesOptions Options for the IClient.mergeFiles method.
PopulateFilesOptions Options class for the IClient 'populateFiles' method.
ReconcileFilesOptions IClient reconcileFiles method Options definitions.
ReopenFilesOptions Options-based method options for IClient reopenFiles method(s).
ResolvedFilesOptions Options class for the IClient.resolvedFiles method.
ResolveFilesAutoOptions Options class for IClient.resolveFilesAuto.
RevertFilesOptions Options-based method options for IClient revertFiles method(s).
ShelveFilesOptions Options class for the IClient.shelveFiles method and associated convenience methods.
SyncOptions Simple default options object for IClient.sync.
UnlockFilesOptions Options class for IClient.unlockFiles.
UnshelveFilesOptions Options class for the IClient.unshelveFiles method and associated convenience methods.
